description: Some atlases surveyed by Ernest Hexamer & William Locher. Some atlases surveyed and drawn by Ernest Hexamer. Some atlases surveyed and drawn by Ernest Hexamer & Son. Orientation varies. Described in unpublished index to non-Sanborn fire insurance maps in Geography & Map Division Reading Room. Annotations in pencil and colored pencil on most maps. Amendments pasted on most maps. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Check call number and author Cutter.

description: Covering from Puebla (Ciudad de los Angeles) to Mexico City, passing through the Sierra Nevada Mountains and the Iztaccihuati and Popocatepeti volcanoes. Relief shown pictorially. Title from publisher's advertisement. Pen-and-ink and watercolors. Text on verso: El mapa que antecede esta fiel y legalmente copiado del original por el que suscribo segun su leal saber y entender; con interecion del Co. Franccisco Rosales paleografo e interprete del idioma mejicana del Archivo General de la Nacion en cuanto a la escritura, y voces del esperado idioma.  Mejico Abril 27 de 1862. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.

created_published: Mexico, D.F. : Cristobal Garcia y Solarer, Francisco Rosales, 1862.
